uk.ac.cam.darknet.database

Class DatabaseManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.cam.darknet.database.DatabaseManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PrimaryDatabaseManager, SecondaryDatabaseManager

    public abstract class DatabaseManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Any implementation of this abstract class has methods to search for individuals. Both the data collection manager and effects should use implementations of this class to search for individuals.
    Author:
    Ibtehaj Nadeem

                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        Attempts to find and return an individual by their ID.
        Parameters:
        id - The unique ID of the individual to return.
        Returns:

                                     throws java.sql.SQLException
        Return a list of individuals who are sitting on the specified seat.
        Parameters:
        seat - The seat, expressed as a string.
        Returns:

      • getByEventDate

        public java.util.List<Individual> getByEventDate(java.util.Date eventDate)
                                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        Return a list of individuals by the date and time of an event.
        Parameters:
        eventDate - The date and time of the event of which all individuals are to be fetched.
        Returns:
        A list of individuals, each of which has booked a ticket for the given date.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
